definition: to smash/to pound/to fail/to muck up/to bungle
to destroy/to damage/to ruin/to defame/to slander

sentences.english: Shop windows were shattered. Cars were smashed.
sentences.chinese: 商店玻璃破碎，汽車被砸毀，大量傷者躺在街頭。

sentences.english: Has destroyed Argentina's 5 "the super colors" the attack airplane.
sentences.chinese: 砸毀了阿根廷的5架“超級軍旗”攻擊機。

definition: lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
to attack with a bladed weapon
Kanting township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)
to shoot with a gun/shooting incident
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
Chutien township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert a danger (esp. political or medical)
